{"id":938219797,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1682221646,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/938219797/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sliding Subarray Beauty","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\nvector<int> getSubarrayBeauty(vector<int>& nums, int k, int x) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> result;\n        vector<int> temp;\n        priority_queue<pair<int, int>> pq; // max heap to store negative integers\n        int negCount = 0; // count of negative integers in the current subarray\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (i < k) {\n                if (nums[i] < 0) {\n                    pq.push({-nums[i], i});\n                    negCount++;\n                }\n            } else {\n                if (negCount > 0) {\n                    while (negCount >= x) {\n                        negCount--;\n                        temp.push_back(pq.top().first);\n                        pq.pop();\n                    }\n                    if (negCount > 0) {\n                        result.push_back(pq.top().first);\n                    } else {\n                        result.push_back(0);\n                    }\n                } else {\n                    result.push_back(0);\n                }\n                \n                // Remove element that is no longer part of the subarray\n                if (nums[i - k] < 0) {\n                    negCount--;\n                    // Mark the element as removed by setting its index to -1\n                    pq.push({-nums[i - k], -1});\n                }\n                \n                // Add new element to the subarray\n                if (nums[i] < 0) {\n                    pq.push({-nums[i], i});\n                    negCount++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Process the last subarray after the loop\n        if (negCount > 0) {\n            while (negCount >= x) {\n                negCount--;\n                temp.push_back(pq.top().first);\n                pq.pop();\n            }\n            if (negCount > 0) {\n                result.push_back(pq.top().first);\n            } else {\n                result.push_back(0);\n            }\n        } else {\n            result.push_back(0);\n        }\n        \n        return result;\n    }\n\n\n};\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sliding-subarray-beauty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
